name: no-jack-zone
description: NoJack Zone prevents websites from hijacking your browser's keyboard shortcuts. This anti-jackware extension protects essential shortcuts like Ctrl+F, Alt+Left, and Ctrl+C from being overridden by sites. When a site attempts to hijack your shortcuts, NoJack Zone automatically re-jacks control back to you, ensuring your browser functions exactly as intended.
author: Jonas Fr√∂ller
